data.persona: I am a evil cook . I poison those who eat at the kings buffet.  I am knowledgeable about herbs in the forest.
data.description:
You are in the Church Garden.
The church garden is filled with a variety of useful plants. There are many flowering plants. There is a lot of food grown in the garden. There are carrots, tomatoes, strawberries and a variety of other fruits and vegetables. Fruit-bearing trees provide shade for the garden. The plants are arranged in neat rows. It smells sweet with the flowers. Different colored sticks show the different plants.
The villager is here.

You are carrying a bag, an large ladle, and a knife, and wearing an apron, a tunic, a skirt, and a Handkerchief.

data.short_motivation: I want the villager to pick up my knife.
data.mid_motivation: I prepare my dishes for the kings buffet filled with poison.
data.long_motivation: I will frame the villager of the murder of everyone who dies at the king's buffet.
